title: Structured settlement agreements and annuity contracts
dataVerified: Claimant name, annuity issuer, payment schedule, present value, settlement details
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Payment status (active/paid). Link to annuity company system (beneficiaries and authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents forged structured settlements. Domain binding verifies annuity company. Extremely long lifetime (decades of payments). High-value settlements ($500K-$10M+ typical). Beneficiary verification. Multi-page: Settlement agreements are multi-page contracts.
